lead_paragraph: Caster Semenya, the women’s 800-meter world champion, will not receive the results of her gender verification tests until June, Athletics South Africa said on Wednesday.
snippet: Caster Semenya, the women’s 800-meter world champion, will not receive the results of her gender verification tests until June, Athletics South Africa said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Semenya Won’t Receive Test Results Until June
headline.print_headline: Semenya Won’t Receive Results of Sex Verification Tests Until June
